# supportAddingVertexBinaryFunctions

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether you can use the pipeline to create new pipelines by adding binary functions to the vertex shader’s callable functions list.

## Declaration

```swift
var supportAddingVertexBinaryFunctions: Bool { get set }
```

## Specifying precompiled shader binaries

- **supportAddingFragmentBinaryFunctions**: A Boolean value that indicates whether you can use the pipeline to create new pipelines by adding binary functions to the fragment shader’s callable functions list.
- **binaryArchives**: An array of binary archives to search for precompiled versions of the shader.
